00051 #define STANDARD_START_CALL(MY_NAME, PTR_TO_ME) \
00052    sys::MY_NAME *me = \
00053         static_cast<sys::MY_NAME*>(PTR_TO_ME); \
00054    me->setIsRunning(true); \
00055    me->target()->run(); \
00056    me->setIsRunning(false); \
00057    if (me != me->target()) { delete me->target(); }
00058 
00059 
00072 template <typename T> class ThreadInterface
00073             : public Runnable
00074 {
00075 public:
00076     enum { DEFAULT_LEVEL, KERNEL_LEVEL, USER_LEVEL };
00077     enum { MIN_PRIORITY, NORM_PRIORITY, MAX_PRIORITY };
00078 
00080     ThreadInterface() : mIsSelf(true)
00081     {
00082         initialize(this, NORM_PRIORITY, DEFAULT_LEVEL, "");
00083     }
00091     ThreadInterface(std::string name) : mIsSelf(true)
00092     {
00093         initialize(this, NORM_PRIORITY, DEFAULT_LEVEL, name);
00094     }
00095 
00096 
00101     ThreadInterface(Runnable *target) : mIsSelf(false)
00102     {
00103         initialize(target, NORM_PRIORITY, DEFAULT_LEVEL, "");
00104     }
00105 
00114     ThreadInterface(Runnable *target,
00115                     std::string name) : mIsSelf(false)
00116     {
00117         initialize(target, NORM_PRIORITY, DEFAULT_LEVEL, name);
00118     }
00119 
00120     ThreadInterface(Runnable *target,
00121                     std::string name,
00122                     int level,
00123                     int priority) : mIsSelf(false)
00124     {
00125         initialize(target, priority, level, name);
00126     }
00127 
00128     ThreadInterface(const ThreadInterface& t)
00129     {
00130         mName = t.mName;
00131         mPriority = t.mPriority;
00132         mLevel = t.mLevel;
00133         mIsRunning = false;
00134         if (t.mIsSelf)
00135         {
00136             mTarget = this;
00137             mIsSelf = true;
00138         }
00139         else
00140         {
00141             mTarget = t.mTarget;
00142             mIsSelf = false;
00143         }
00144     }
00145 
00147     virtual ~ThreadInterface()
00148     {}
00149 
00154     std::string getName() const
00155     {
00156         return mName;
00157     }
00158 
00163     void setName(const std::string& name)
00164     {
00165         mName = name;
00166     }
00167 
00173     int getLevel() const
00174     {
00175         return mLevel;
00176     }
00177 
00182     int getPriority() const
00183     {
00184         return mPriority;
00185     }
00186 
00197     virtual void setPriority(int priority)
00198     {
00199         mPriority = priority;
00200     }
00201 
00207     virtual void start() = 0;
00208 
00212     virtual bool kill() = 0;
00213 
00214     // You could say Thread(new MyThread()).start();
00220     virtual void run()
00221     {}
00222 
00226     virtual bool join() = 0;
00227 
00231     static void yield();
00232     //     std::string toString() const { return mName; }
00233 
00238     Runnable* target()
00239     {
00240         return mTarget;
00241     }
00242 
00243     virtual bool isRunning()
00244     {
00245         return mIsRunning;
00246     }
00247     virtual void setIsRunning(bool isRunning)
00248     {
00249         mIsRunning = isRunning;
00250     }
00251 
00258     T& getNative()
00259     {
00260         return mNative;
00261     }
00262 
00267     const char* getNativeType() const
00268     {
00269         return typeid(mNative).name();
00270     }

00273     bool mIsSelf;
00274 
00275     T mNative;
00282     void initialize(Runnable *target,
00283                     int priority,
00284                     int level,
00285                     const std::string& name)
00286     {
00287         mTarget = target;
00288         mName = name;
00289         mLevel = level;
00290         mPriority = priority;
00291         mIsRunning = false;
00292     }
